sentence.Network_en: "Anything else?" Colum asked. Kathryn shook her head wearily.
sentence.Network_cn: “还有别的吗？”科拉姆问。凯瑟琳疲惫地摇了摇头。

sentence.Network_en: Furness shrugs wearily. He has heard it all before.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗内斯疲倦地耸了耸肩。这事他早就全知道了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 求英文中表达感情的形容词！！！！！！_百度知道 ... unwearied 不疲倦的 wearily 疲倦地 weariness 疲倦.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... wear 穿带 wearily 疲劳地 weariness 疲劳.
He trudged wearily along the path ., 他沿着小路疲惫地走去.
以w开头的英语英文单词 ... wearer 穿用者 wearily 疲倦地；厌烦地 weariness 疲倦,厌倦,疲劳.

list.abs: walk warily 谨慎行事walk wearily 疲乏地走walk about 漫步,散步
fold voluminously 大部分倒闭fold wearily 支持不住fold back (使)向后折
Around midnight , Melinda wearily turned off the oven ., 半夜前后 , 梅林达疲倦地关掉了烤炉.
in the evenings , long after visiting hours ended , I drove myself wearily back to his apartment .晚上，探视时间结束后很久，我满身疲惫，开车返回父亲的公寓。

entry.def: If you are weary, you are very tired.

example.tran: 雷切尔看起来脸色苍白，疲惫不堪。

entry.tran: 不再感兴趣的;感到厌烦的
entry.def: If you are weary of something, you have become tired of it and have lost your enthusiasm for it.

example.ex: They're getting awfully weary of this silly war...
example.tran: 他们越来越厌烦这场无聊的战争。

example.ex: She was weary of being alone.

entry.def: If you weary of something or it wearies you, you become tired of it and lose your enthusiasm for it.

example.ex: The public had wearied of his repeated warnings of a revolution that never seemed to start...
example.tran: 他一再预警的革命迟迟没有开始，公众已对此感到厌倦。

example.ex: He had wearied of teaching in state universities...
example.tran: 他已经厌烦了在州立大学教书。

auth_sentence.content: Players wearily slumped in their chairs and slugged water.
auth_sentence.res_content: Players wearily slumped in their chairs and slugged water.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Players wearily slumped in their chairs and slugged water.

auth_sentence.content: The Malian hotelier jokes wearily about missiles landing in his courtyard.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Malian hotelier jokes wearily about missiles landing in his courtyard.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Malian hotelier jokes wearily about missiles landing in his courtyard.

auth_sentence.content: Cora, sensing her exclusion, sighs wearily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cora, sensing her exclusion, sighs wearily.

sentences.cn: 科比特疲倦地揉了揉眼睛。

sentences.en: The old tramp shambled wearily up the path.
sentences.cn: 这个年老的流浪汉疲惫不堪,蹒跚地走上了小路。

sentences.en: He sagged wearily back in his chair.
sentences.cn: 他疲倦地瘫坐到椅子上。
